Great! Sedona has plenty of great restaurants and cafes where you can refuel after your hike. Here are a few recommendations:

1. The Hudson: This restaurant features Southwestern cuisine with a modern twist, and offers scenic views of the red rock formations. It's located on the main drag, so it's convenient to get to after your hike.

2. Creekside American Bistro: This restaurant has a creekside patio where you can enjoy American cuisine, and is known for its excellent cocktails. It's a great choice if you're looking for a relaxing post-hike meal.

3. Mariposa Latin Inspired Grill: This restaurant features Latin-inspired cuisine and offers incredible views of Sedona's red rock formations. It's a bit pricier, but the food and views make it worth it.

4. Coffee Pot Restaurant: This diner-style restaurant is famous for its 101 omelets, and is a great choice if you're looking for a hearty breakfast or brunch before or after your hike.

5. Heartline Café: This restaurant offers a variety of American and international dishes using local ingredients. It also has a cozy atmosphere and is a great choice if you're looking for a relaxed post-hike meal.

These are just a few of the many great restaurants and cafes in Sedona. There are plenty of options to choose from, whether you're looking for a casual meal or a more upscale dining experience.
